column4: i had an ATI card, and as a result i was ALWAYS getting screwed by my video, so ive played with it plenty!
i bought a $30 nvidia card and it blew my $150 ati card away in linux.... well, until it blew up. (hence my earlier question) :)
yeah - i just mentioned it a few minutes ago. ;)
my pci geforce2 mx blew my ati radeon 9800 pro away
